content: stay warm in the chilly fall air with this beanie this pattern uses large textured stitches that are fun to make and work up quickly the texture provides enough interest to make this hat with a single color but using multiple colors can give you more vibrant look size 5 bulky yarn keeps it feeling warm and using an 8mm hook makes the stitches tight to keep the air out of those big holes this pattern includes instructions for sizes baby to adult large supplies 125-150 yards bulky cyc 5 yarn samples lion brand yarn hue +me or for multiple colors color a 75-100 yds color b 25-50 yds color c 25-50 yds crochet hook us size l 8 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry sewing needle scissors and measuring tape/gauge ruler pom and button to make it removable optional finished hat circumference baby 15 inches toddler 16 inches child 18 5 inches teen 20 inches medium 21 inches large 22 inches sizes are marked with parentheses baby toddler child and stitch counts are marked at the end of each row in brackets baby toddler child pattern is worked in the round except for the band which is worked in row attached alternative to magic_ring chain 4 slip_stitch to 1st chain work round 1 as written in pattern stitch tutorials begin on page 5 as well as instructions to work pattern with multiple colors
